about_the_game:
On September 3, 1934, a passing truck driver saw a disturbing glow coming from an old mansion, The Rosefield Manor on the outskirts of Northern England and decided to investigate. Inside, he discovered a horrifying scene: ten bodies scattered across the bloodstained floors, and in a bathtub filled with blood, a young girl lay dead, her eyes wide open in a frozen gaze. Truck Driver rushed to alert the police, who arrived to find the same gruesome sight. Despite their efforts, the investigation yielded no answers, leaving the mansion forever marked by the unresolved tragedy.

Years later, our protagonist, named Michael Dawson a freelancer specializing in antique acquisitions, came across a newspaper clipping about the mansion's grim history while perusing records at the town library. Intrigued by the macabre tale and the possibility of uncovering valuable artifacts, he decided to investigate the abandoned mansion himself. Driven by a mix of curiosity and professional interest, he ventured to the decaying estate, hoping to uncover relics and secrets hidden within its haunted walls.

"Find all the paranormal antiques in Rosefield Manor and escape before it catches you, as your life is at stake."

• Randomized Events & Item Spawns

• Procedural horror experience

• Atmosphere & Sound Design

• Custom made AI behaviour 

• High fidelity Graphics, using the power of Unreal Engine 5

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of blood, psychological horror, death
